12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: Louisiana Federation of Teachers is the state organization and affiliate of the American Federation of Teachers, AFL-CIC ("AFT"). the national union. Louisiana Federation of Teachers has approximately 22,000 members in 35 locals representing support teachers and support personnel. ILIAC made a cash payment totaling $2,000 to sponsor a breakfast at the Annual Louisiana Federation of Teachers Conference held November 18-20, 2007, in Lake Charles, Iouisiana.

The Oregon Education Association ("OEA") represents about 46,000 educators working in Oregon's pre-kindergarten through grade 12 public schools and community colleges. OEA'S membership includes licensed teachers and specialists, education support professionals, community college faculty, retired educators and student members. ING Life Insurance and Annual ty Company ("ILIAC") offers various annuity and other investment products to OEA members, including products intended for use with Section 403 (b) tax deferred annuity and Section 457 deferred compensation programs. ILIAC made cash payments for advertising in OEA'S 2006 and 2007 calendar books In addition, ILIAC made a $5,250 payment to sponsor a reception at the OEA 2007 Representative Assembly Conference, along with two other companies.
